name: Yahoo! Japan ad block
description:
Yahoo! Japan（トップページ以外も）の広告ブロック
ニュースのコメント欄も削除
css:
@namespace url(http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml);

@-moz-document domain("yahoo.co.jp"){
 a[href*="ard.ane.yahoo.co.jp"],
 a[href*="rd.ane.yahoo.co.jp"],
 iframe[id="jp_ads_im_empty"],
 iframe[id="tgtMON"],
 a img[width="176"][height="31"],
 a img[width="300"][height="60"],
 #adAms,
 #adImgIM1,
 #adLrec,
 #adSqb,
 #adSqm,
 #brandpanel,
 #center1,
 #cgmboxR,
 #cfInner,
 #commentTabContents,   
 #contents-footer,
 #event,
 #eventPromo,
 #fcDiv,
 #homeLclAds,
 #homeLRECAds,
 #jp_ymail_promo_right,
 #lrec, 
 #my-sp-infowrap,
 #mySqbWrap,
 #notices,
 #pos-ct,
 #pos-lrec,
 #pos-sqb,
 #pos-sqm,
 #pos-tlrec,
 #pos-ult,
 #pos-ysp,
 #right1,
 #rightbox,
 #selectionR,
 #sIn,
 #sqb_main,
 #tabElem0,
 #tct,
 #theAd,
 #vo_main,
 #yjidbox,
 .adCt,
 .adIM_criteo,
 .adRp2Col,
 .adTUT,
 .adTUTCon,
 .adTUTHl,
 .adTyumoku,
 .adUltra,
 .blockFloat3col,
 .commentBox,
 .md_adImg,
 .NoticeColumnRe,
 .rightPanel,
 .socialButton,
 .textCenter,
 .yjw_sub_md,
 .ymui3DHeaderLG,
 .ymuiHeaderBGLG,
 .ynCtsSelectNav{
 display: none !important;
 }

#yregtxt{
 visibility:hidden !important;
 }
}
